description:
SIMPLIFY YOUR LIFE

"The modern minimalists" online course gives you an overview of a minimalist life. I'll show you the most important aspects of minimalism in this short 40min course.

You need a starting point and a direction. That's what I'll give you.

You don't need a "How to get a minimalist guide" or a 10 hours course. In the end you have to act to see results. I give you the theory and you have to put this theory in practice.

The whole online course is clear structured and it's important to watch the lessons in order.

Overview:

  • Quick overview about minimalism
  • Setting up your home the right way and get rid of unimportant stuff
  • Changing your lifestyle
  • Motivation


I'm looking forward to welcome you.
title: The Minimalist - A better life with less stuff
